pullRequest.title: SONARJAVA-3413 RSPEC-5842 Regex repetition pattern's body should not match the empty String

commit.message: SONARJAVA-3413 RSPEC-5842 Regex repetition pattern's body should not match the empty String

nodes.bodyText: The issue should either be reported on tree.getElement() instead of tree or the message should be changed. The way it is now, the message would imply that in (x*)* the whole expression should be changed to not match the empty string when in fact only the inner part ((x*)) should be changed to not match the empty string.

commit.message: Change report location to repetition element
